content: unison language is so fascinating to me: https://www.unison-lang.org/unison-1-0

Oh, that’s kinda freaky.

No files and it’s own runtime with built in VCS kind of reminds of one of those Smalltalk environments… Squeak? I tried it, but it felt like such a departure. Cool idea though.

But this looks more like an FP take on a similar concept. I’ll have to check it out sometime.
yeah, it upends a lot of my brain, haha
